Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Grillo "Thomas Grillo"
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. Fairly speedy, and has a great display. Also like the fact it uses micro SD card slots. Makes it quick and easy for me to set up all my accompaniment playback tracks when I do live theremin performances with the device mounted on my theremin's stand.The keyboard case is a great accessory. Unlike Bluetooth, it just simply uses a usb adaptor to connect to the device. I like the keys on this keyboard too. For it's size, they're fairly easy to access, and are well marked.This device works well with games like Minecraft, Doom, racing games, ect. Also great for web browsing too. Again, the keyboard case, protects the device, and makes for easy typing when sending emails, and entering web urls, and passwords. Not as difficult has having to use the on-screen keyboards.A great little tablet for the price. :)

Reviews.Title: Tagital Tablet
Reviews.Author: Don Prell
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot because  it is just the right size for me and was easy to learn how to operate.However, I found the accompanying brochure completely useless--print way too small and infonegligible.  I would recommend it to anyone.  And, of course, the price is great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value/Budget Tablet
Reviews.Author: rpv

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3QC7KJIPXBBYWcurrentClick) { return cv_mo3QC7KJIPXBBYWcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 5:53 MinsTagital 9 inch is an All Winner Dual Core A23, Cortex A8 at 1.5GHz and is a very good value in price per performance. It has 512 MB RAM and also has a GPU. This runs Android 4.2.2 Android. I will go into the specifications and review based on my user experience. The dimensions are 9.4"x 5.8" x 0.51" and weighs 17.36 oz.Most of tablets have ARM based processors. This makes sure all of the Apps in Google Play ecosystem available. If you look at my video review, I have screenshots showing the CPU speed and other kernel details. The screen is 800 x 480 Pixels. This supports a wireless with Wi-Fi (802.11 BGN). Tablet has 2 cameras - front and back. This has 8 GB storage and you can use an extensible SD card slot as well as cloud storage. Though not built in, the tablet supports external 3G/WCDMA dongle. Battery came for a good 8 hours with moderate usage. Battery usage really depends on how heavy you use the system. Overnight it drained very less. Mobile Networking was on by default. I switched off as I was using only Wi-Fi mode. I suggest you go to Settings and tweak things which are not required. Developer Mode was enabled by default. I turned it off. The capacitive touch screen was really good, some occasions I had to press little harder and at right locations, but pinch-zoom, highlight, Copy-Paste all worked very well.It is great the tablet has micro USB Port, 3.5-mm stereo Headphone Jack, built-in speaker, microphone, micro SD card slot and a DC Input Jack. Note that for powering through wall adapter you need to use the provided DC input jack. Speaker was loud enough. In a room, once I keep the tablet in a stand it was good. Speaker is on the backside, so you don't want to lie this down on back as it will hamper the audio coming out. This is a design I hope changes in Android manufacturers in future. Android tablets are really customizable to your heart's content. It is here where Tagital shines. Using a native Android 4.2.2, they have achieved something at a low cost. This can have a very wide reaching audience. In many countries, where affordability is key, having a tablet like this with Wi-Fi is a big boon. Imagine having entire Wikipedia at your fingertips for a child. I tried few educational applications on this. I consider this as a big hit with educators than gamers.I tried Google Voice Search and asked "what is capital of United States". The voice recognition part was great and it was able to recognize and dictate the answer. I also tried Wolfram Alpha and asked bunch of questions. E.g., what is world population, what is population of China etc? The microphone picked up correctly and answered through Wolfram Alpha. Apps like Calculator, Gmail performed flawlessly. I watched multiple video through few applications. Obvious first choice was YouTube. Was able to search and watch videos. I used TwIT.TV app and watched some segments of a podcast (video streaming through Wi-Fi). Again smooth playback. Handholding is really easy given the weight of it. It was a colorful blue; no heat observed handholding the tablet. It is plastic, and buttons are made of plastic. For a kid, this is perfect also though the feature set is equally appealing to an adult. I was so enamored with low cost computers in late 90s and it seems I am reliving them with tablet. If you want to listen to podcasts/watch video then this is perfect. Just keep it in a stand and connect to power. See my video review to get an idea of what I am referring to.The keyboard dock makes it very easy to type documents in Google Drive or other note taking apps like Evernote. The USB attached keyboard is rugged and keys are smooth to type. This is an excellent innovation and dual serves as a case + keyboard combo. It also serves as a stand for watching playback videos.For a computer geek, it is a challenge to design something with minimal resources - screen resolution, RAM, storage, chipset. Tagital has designed a tablet with budget conscious customer in mind. Out of the box, it worked to my satisfaction given the specification and price. Once powered on, it directly came to a working condition. No need to setup account prior to using. I signed with Wi-Fi, the Wi-Fi router was in one bedroom. I configured in another room separated by two rooms. There was no issue with Wi-Fi signal. Once connected, I created a Google account as well. I generated a Application Specific password as I had 2 factor authentication. Once signed on, I updated applications like YouTube, Google Keyboard etc. I also downloaded few applications like TwitT.TV, Tetris from EA, etc. I downloaded Chrome and browsed few websites. Listened to Audio / Watched Video. Out of the box battery needed a full charge. Initially without charge, I did a video stream and wanted to see how device shutdown. Sure enough it shut down as battery drained. Powered on after charging and everything was fine.I have read from AllWinner's press release that A23 chip clocks in at 1.5GHz and delivers unparalleled low power consumption. Allwinner's newly designed ultra-standby mode enables over 60 days of device standby time and an advanced Talking Standby mode for low power voice talk. The A23's high level of integration also makes it an extremely compelling platform choice for OEMs and ODMs. With features like integrated MIPI DSI, the A23 platform requires a market leading less-than-260 components on board, reducing system cost and design complexity for manufacturers. I am impressed enough at the engineering for the price/value/budget it delivers. Cortex-A8 Processor is an ARM Cortex(tm)-A8 processor, based on the ARMv7 architecture, has the ability to scale in speed from 600MHz to greater than 1GHz. The Cortex-A8 processor can meet the requirements for power-optimized mobile devices needing operation in less than 300mW; and performance-optimized consumer applications requiring 2000 Dhrystone MIPS. This is from ARM specification. Tagital has pulled in many off the shelf components and assembled at a terrific value. I was particularly interested how it performs to streaming video. That is the golden test and it performed beautifully!I was provided this product in exchange of a fair and honest review.

Reviews.Title: I'm jealous of my 10yr old
Reviews.Author: Shelley D
Reviews.Content: This is a 2nd bday receiving an off brand tablet. We learned a lot last time & after using this new one extensively for over a month it seems we made a far better purchase this year. We have not had to reset it or has it frozen up. It has run every available moment that a 10yr has. Love the keyboard plus ability to use touchscreen, fits snug in the nice case, has camera's on both front & back. If there are more for the same package deal price at Mothers Day this is what I will be requesting!

Reviews.Title: good buy !!!!!!
Reviews.Author: KATHY
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son .  He uses it all the time.  I would recommend this puchase.  Great price

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Joel Bear
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a problem since I got it. This is the girst tablet that I've purchased and I'm about to order another one.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Athena D Williams
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND.THE PRICE IS UNBEATABLE.THE ACCIDENT PROTECTION PLAN IS SO INEXPENSIVE - WORTH IT, EVEN IF NEVER USED!!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Meri
Reviews.Content: this 9'' tagital android works very well i use it to replace my laptop which has to be fixed. I purchased with the keyboard bundle so it is very  comfortable to use

Reviews.Title: Tagital android bundle
Reviews.Author: Elisa Bohanan
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It does everything my android phone can do, with the added benefit of the keyboard and carrying case.  well worth the money, and i highly recommend, would even be a great starter for a child aged 10-15 if you can't afford an expensive laptop.

Reviews.Title: So far,  so NOT good.
Reviews.Author: TrishaB
Reviews.Content: So far, so NOT good. I keep getting error messages when downloading apps; the instruction manual is useless; runs slow and doesn't hold a charge for very long. I'm waiting to hear back from the seller. Keeping my fingers crossed that he/she can give me some useful advice.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOD
Reviews.Author: jonsoutback
Reviews.Content: Did not like it varry slow and has a mind of it own. Click on a tab and it would go some where eles. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: new product
Reviews.Author: joselnar_n
Reviews.Content: I liked the price and model, because I get the qualification according to the detailed in the publication, recommended to buy this excellent product.

Reviews.Title: stan Carpenter with Android 4.3A23 Cual Core Tblrt PC Dual Camers Bundled with MTM trading LLC
Reviews.Author: Stanley
Reviews.Content: Not sure how I feel.  Still trying to get it working.  Sure would be nice to have a full instruction.  New to the field, but still trying.

Reviews.Title: Good enough.
Reviews.Author: Kellie Martin
Reviews.Content: The tablet is slow running,  but for the price, it was worth it. It was for my 13 yr old.  He seems to like it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tara Phillips
Reviews.Content: Works very well, especially for the price!  I would definitely buy this again. It arrived on time and worked and my daughter really enjoys it.

Reviews.Title: do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Jaime L. Schneider
Reviews.Content: If I could select 0 stars I would.  I purchased this tablet as a Christmas gift and from the beginning it did not have the google play store installed which made the tablet pointless.  It also has a horrible battery life and runs very slowly.  When I contacted the seller with these problems I was told they would send me a SD card that would fix the issues.  The SD card only added the google play store it did not do anything else.  When I then asked to return it for a full refund I wad told it was past the allowed return time.  Since I contacted them from the beginning with a problem I think I should have been given the courtesy to return it even though it was past the return policy timeline.  Very unfair and unprofessional.  I would not purchase this tablet or anything from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Cost too much for what you get
Reviews.Author: Princess
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a Christmas gift and first of all the charger didn't work  --- or so I thought.  One of the keys on the keyboard was loose from the beginning and kept falling out.  A week later the entire tablet wouldn't charge and I think it is in the tablet itself maybe the charge port because no charger would get it to turn on.  I put precious and priceless videos and pictures on it and now I had to send it back.  I was told that maybe the manufacturers in CHINA may be able to retrieve the photos and videos - MAYBE.  This was not a good experience for me!

Reviews.Title: I like it, but shipping charge is too much...
Reviews.Author: Miss California "love sweets"
Reviews.Content: I got this the other day.  So far I like it.  It is very nice. Quick response. Key board does not look cheap and it works.  But for the shipping charge: $30.00 ???? really ?  I never asked for priority mail.  But I will keep this.  I like it.  I am not a video game or app down load user. Just browsing and Netflix..

Reviews.Title: Questionable Product Origin-Questionable Company
Reviews.Author: Virginia Pulda
Reviews.Content: I've only had this tablet less than a week and haven't had much time to explore it yet but these are my impressions so far:1.) The "Owner's Manual" appears to be a poor photocopy of the original manual.  The type is so small I had to use a magnifying glass to read it.  It is written in broken English and has unintelligible screen shots and images.2.) The scroll down arrows don't always work.  For this reason I am unable to load programs, such as my email and Drop Box.  I'm trying to see if there is a way to adjust this before giving up and returning it to Amazon.3.) This is a very stripped down product, I guess this is to be expected for the price.4.) The wire to connect the keyboard are supposed to have been fed through a sewn on guide in the case, but it was not.So far I am unimpressed and feel I would be better off with different tablet.

Reviews.Title: great product great price
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Jones
Reviews.Content: I give this a five star because we bacically use this to use facebook, ovoo, You tube. We also  watch videos from AVI and MP4 files we put on external SD card. I purchased a 32gb sd card to add additional storage space. We loaded lots of game apps. It works fine. My daughter does a lot of writing for school, and she is able to work on her school papers with this anywhere and anytime. Im going to purchase at least 2 more. One for my sister and one for me!!!! We love it. A great bargain for only $99.99. Works just as good as a $500.00 one. no regrets here

Reviews.Title: First Impressions: So Far, So Bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was reluctant to buy an off-brand but this looked like exactly what I wanted for a good price. I read the reviews and felt they were mixed -- with some people saying "It's great" and others saying "It's horrible." So far, I have not been able to do anything I normally do on my other tablet. The keyboard worked at first but now does not respond, even though it is plugged in and connected via the USB port as it should be. My main reason for purchasing this was to have an external keyboard, so that's a deal breaker. Internet is extremely slow and stalls often. I may not keep it long enough to test the battery endurance (I have it plugged in and charging right now).

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: Phil Kime
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I was looking for at lighting speed and (WOW) what a bargain price. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Not happy..too bad they had a negative star option.
Reviews.Author: Robyn miles
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Christmas present. Had purchased the warranty, went to check on warranty today (3-9-14) and there is now no charge for warranty. Now I am stuck with a tablet that is cracked and won't turn on. I will not be ordering anything from this buyer again, now will I be ordering anything from Amazon based on all of the issues I have had throughout all my orders. This tablet is now nothing more than a paper weight.

Reviews.Title: Iffy
Reviews.Author: Kage
Reviews.Content: This product has a freezing problem even though it works well. The battery like really stinks. Worth the money though. Convenient if nothing else

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Stanislaw Czaja
Reviews.Content: This product is so bad it should not be sold:1) Very bad screen resolution - you'll see NOTHING in the day lite2) Very limited brightness of the screen3) Very low audio volume4) Very low-res/bad camera - if this is even 1 mpix I would be surprised5) Very BAD power consumption6) Seem like a subset of Android functionalityAs it was a present, have to find someone to give it to - but can't afford to loose a friend!

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: laurin didway
Reviews.Content: The keyboard scratched the screen all the way down on one side. the tablet its self not great but good enough for my 10 yr. Old

Reviews.Title: problems
Reviews.Author: SHELLY SENGCHANH
Reviews.Content: I have had a lot of problems with this item.....I power on and it will go through it's start up and I haven't even been able to put the internet connection on cause it gets frozen and just stays frozen

Reviews.Title: I do not recommend this product at all!
Reviews.Author: Damaris S. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Terrible, from the beginning the screen kept freezing up. Then the screen would not go on sleeping mode, it had to be turned off or keep it on with the screen using up the battery. Then screen cracked. This product was not worth the money we spent on it. I do not recommend it at all. My star rating is 0

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: salima
Reviews.Content: This  product is not what I expected. Giving the price I knew it was not going to be something exeptional but it ended up being less than what I expected.The shipping was pretty fast (two days or less) but it screen was dirty as if someone used it before. The transparent paper protecting the screen started coming out (as if someone attempted to take it off).There is very litle storage; I only downloaded five apps and it was already full.The main problem I hve with this tablet is that the screen keeps freezing. Whenever I will try to go back more than once, the screen turns black ans get stuck. I had to rebooted several times because of that.In addition, I had to force the charger to get into the external port. It didn't want to get in there. it was also hard for me to connect the keyboard and the tablet.Besides that, I really like the keyboard.Very comfy to work on.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Francisco Herrera
Reviews.Content: Sound brokeI have to plug in an external speaker or earphonesAnd the power and vol bottons fall off

Reviews.Title: Deal of the Day !!!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Raccuia
Reviews.Content: First off , the unit arrived 3 days after ordering... nice . The well crafted  & beautifully stitched cover with included keyboard was very impressive out of the box ..!  Unit fired up right away with no probs ... adding apps was & is very easy , not to mention a very extensive android store.... although some apps may not be compatible .Have had for a few weeks now & am very pleased . Have shown unit to family , friends & co-workers , some of whom have the more expensive tablets  , and all have been impressed , especially at the $69.00 price point.... Are you kidding me... !!!! $69.00 inc. shipping....??? !!!!  This Tagital Tablet may not be the Top of the Line , widely known "name" tablet as some might think  but , this is definitely the deal of day "tablet"  for the price point and is one sweet unit... !!  Thanks Tagital.... I'll probably get another... hey some of us blow more than $69.00 a month in lattes...think about it......selah....

Reviews.Title: Not good quality
Reviews.Author: Ryan Martin
Reviews.Content: Battery doesn't last long at all... The processor is slow. And the display is kinda blury when Internet browsing... I would not buy another one.  How ever I do like the size of it and the price that's it.

Reviews.Title: not worth the plastic its made of.
Reviews.Author: Amber Barker
Reviews.Content: Item appeared fine, turned on out of the packaging and completed one full charge cycle before mysteriously turning off and refusing to respond to anything else.Item was returned the next day to amazon and a complete refund applied. That is the only part of my experience that was good.

Reviews.Title: worst waste of money on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Gregory mason
Reviews.Content: Waste of money. Can't play music and let screen turn off. It blew my car speakers out when I played music and turned the screen off. cause what happens when you do that is the tab shuts off makes the loudest hi pitched screeching sound and you have to hard reset the tablet losing all your apps.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Rocheleau
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting too much for the price. Its kind of hard to see the screen. My keyboard plug broke within a week. And it was always plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Look good for 3 hours.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: At first bringing out of the package I was genuinely impressed. I charged it to full charge. Set up my facebook, amazon, and pinterest accounts...still good. Let set while I cooked supper. Decided to plug in the keyboard and screen went blank. I tried hard reset, soft reset and google searched the problem to no avail. Have to return. Thankfully Amazon will allow returns quickly. Will not try this again. You get what you pay for most of the time but I did not even get that this time.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy :(
Reviews.Author: johanna
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this tablet good and bad. So had mix feelings, gave it a try and guess what? Yup had to send it back. Didn't work! Not Happy :(

Reviews.Title: don't even bother not worth your time or money
Reviews.Author: john j smith
Reviews.Content: had a hard time connecting my external hard drive would not recognize it. Also after 3 days power button failed

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!`
Reviews.Author: Larry Ivey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet in February 2014 for a replacement to my tablet. I thought it would be a good replacement for the price and size, it was okay until it won't even power on. I tried to find the customer service and tech support no such avail online. So if you get what you pay for which is bogus piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: Some apps are not available.
Reviews.Author: goincrazyntx513
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for the sole purpose for video chat because my husband is gone the majority of the month. It is a way to make missing each other as much. So a little bit disappointed

Reviews.Title: It was very good.
Reviews.Author: Alberto Pérez
Reviews.Content: I like it. The only thing that I don't like it doesn't have an issue to send to print documents or images.

Reviews.Title: It's just okay
Reviews.Author: christy
Reviews.Content: Power cord  was very cheap and loose upon arrival. I have since ordered another cord. Tablet itself doesn't hold a charge long, I hope the new cord will fix this.

Reviews.Title: more storage space
Reviews.Author: geri
Reviews.Content: I do like the tablet for my 10 year old daughter but she complains that it doesn't have enough storage Is there anyway I can add more memory or storage space to it I thought it would be cool for her other than that she loves it

Reviews.Title: Not a Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This.deserves a zero rating. PC only refers.to keyboard. Still "registers as tablet on web sites. The battery runs out much faster than it says. I couldn't get it to display more than Beijing time although it will do.your current time if you punch it. And punch is what I mean...the touchscreen barely works. I am trying to return it but company is.not responding.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!!
Reviews.Author: tonja montgomery
Reviews.Content: My daughter love it!!! It was a xmas gift 4 her...I will be shopping with you all again pretty soon...

Reviews.Title: THIS WILL BE A GOOD STARTER TABLET FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER...
Reviews.Author: PAULIEMAN
Reviews.Content: THE MANUAL THAT CAME WITH IT IS USELESS..ALSO YOU CANT FIND THE MANUFACTURER OR MODEL TO DOWNLOAD A MANUAL THAT IS USEFULL.. PICTURE QUALITY IS POOR...BUT FOR THE PRICE, YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.. ...

Reviews.Title: ok product
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: Its good product and works for everyday use as is why I purchased it would not recomend for anyone wanting to run a buisness from your tablet,Ha,Ha but it works for what I need

Reviews.Title: GEORGIA'S TOY
Reviews.Author: GEORGIA A. ASHLEY
Reviews.Content: I LIKED THE TABLET PRETTY GOOD. IT WORKS WELL WHEN YOU HAVE FAST INTERNET. MY INTERNET CONNECTION IS VERY SLOW. BUT IT WORKS GREAT WHEN YOU GO TO A PLACE THAT HAS FREE WIFI.IRATED THIS PRODUCT A 4 BEACAUSE IT'S NOT TOTALLY GREAT UNLESS YOU HAVE FAST INTERNET.BUT IT'S GREAT IF YOU WANT TO READ A BOOK OR PLAY GAMES ALREADY SAVED ON THE TABLET.PLUS YOU CAN RECORD A MEETING.

Reviews.Title: Slow slow slow
Reviews.Author: Desrey26
Reviews.Content: I took it out of the box and it was 68% charged, which should be fine for use. Sitting right next to my high speed internet browser, it was slower than molasses, just trying to get onto my work webpage.  I'll charge it and try again, if it's still slow, I will be returning it.Update - So after I've used this a few times it seems to work well in my home or other people's homes. But when I get at a business that has password wifi, I cannot get it to work (although my ipad works just fine). I am not happy with the product, but for $85 what should I expect?

Reviews.Title: Waste of money at any cost!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Taylor
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd tablet, the first one had a problem with the battery not charging so I exchanged it for the one I have currently. It has very little storage so on this one I only installed very little thinking things would run more efficiently.. Ha! When u have to reboot 4 times to watch a 90 minute movie.. I think not! Time to return this product, invest some more $ and get something that I can actually enjoy without getting frustrated!!

Reviews.Title: do not puchase
Reviews.Author: prisca dawne laurencin
Reviews.Content: There is a problem with this phone. You must put it on speaker phone to talk to the caller otherwise they can't hear you.  The supplier of this phone was not helpful in rectifying this. So just paid for a phone that's not functioning as it should

Reviews.Title: HELP
Reviews.Author: Machera D.
Reviews.Content: I keep getting unfortunately google play store has stopped. Or web browser has stopped. HELP ME I JUST SPENT $120.00 AND IT WONT WORK

Reviews.Title: Buy it ~ only if you want a piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Kymber-Leigh Means
Reviews.Content: Even for the price this thing isn't worth the price.  When I tried to turn it on, it froze up a few times  There were no instructions on how to get to the battery to reboot the tablet.  The instruction paperwork with it was a joke.  When I pulled off the film that covered the front screen, there were already scratches on it as if it were previously used.  I would never buy from this seller again, nor would I buy this brand again.  Thank goodness for Amazon's return policy or I'd be out money I can't throw away.

Reviews.Title: Thank You
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn Henderson
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for a friend and He enjoys it a lot. Order was placed and receive within a weeks time. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: broken unit
Reviews.Author: Robert B Rand
Reviews.Content: I have notified them twice and have not heard a word from them. The Tablet works fine but the cord that connects it to the keyboard broke the first time I pulled it out. I am very upset with this situation, I hope that Amazon can step in and resolve this, as I have never had a problem with Amazon products before.Thank You in advance,Robert & Judith Rand

Reviews.Title: Happy!!
Reviews.Author: H. Teague "Teagoo"
Reviews.Content: Came very quickly via Mail. Like very much and the fact it has a keyboard is a plus. Only thing is the head phones don't want to work with the tablet  so we have to find another room when watching movies.

Reviews.Title: Decent Tablet
Reviews.Author: LeighAnne S.
Reviews.Content: The only problem with this product is the battery life is not long enough and it has to be constantly be put back on charge. Can't watch an entire movie.

Reviews.Title: good for kids first tablet
Reviews.Author: LeAnn Capley
Reviews.Content: It is a nice starter tablet,bought it for my 10 year old. Its a bit slow on function.She likes it but I know I will be replacing sooner then hoped for!

Reviews.Title: I HATE IT
Reviews.Author: shawn st louis
Reviews.Content: i hate it  this tablet has no gps the battery life is  very short waits of time i will not recommend this tablet to anyone

Reviews.Title: Tagital 9" Android 4.2 Tablet PC Capacitive Touch Screen
Reviews.Author: mecmgc
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my Husband for Christmas.  His doctor told him about an app that can be used on it.  I hope he likes it.

Reviews.Title: PLEASED AND UPSET
Reviews.Author: r langan
Reviews.Content: I purchased 8  of this product, which I found to work well.  I am trying to return 3 of these item that the parents of the children I was gifting said their children were to young.  I am having a problem in the return process.  I have ordered several items but have not had this problem.  So much for service!

Reviews.Title: did not receive
Reviews.Author: Kathy Miller
Reviews.Content: ordered and never received. looks durable for the price but couldn't tell you. Had ordered for 4 yr old who uses my 500. tablet thinking it looks heavy. will consider re ordering.

ProductInfo.Features: Screen: 9 inch 16:9 TFT LCD capacitive multi-touch panel 800 x 480 (WVGA), Front camera: 0.3 Megapixel, Back Camera: 0.3 Megapixel
ProductInfo.Name: Tagital® 9" Android 4.2 A23 Dual Core Tablet PC Dual Camera Bundled with Keyboard
